akn:section.akn:heading: Attorney General to advise the President

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 511. Attorney General to advise the President The Attorney General shall give his advice and opinion on questions of law when required by the President. (Added Pub. L. 89–554, § 4(c), Sept. 6, 1966, 80 Stat. 612.)
